title: Strictly Come Dancing week 4 songs and dances
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

It's that time of the week again as the Strictly Come Dancing songs and dances for week 4 have been revealed.

The 13 remaining couples will be back on the dance floor again this week in a bid to impress the judges and viewers at home.

One pair the will sadly be missing is TV presenter Anneka Rice and her professional partner Kevin Clifton, who were dumped during an explosive Movie Week.

With the Hollywood glitz and glamour now a distant memory, the couples will be getting back to basics with some popular tracks.

There is also a very romantic Couples' Choice this week for Saffron Barker and her partner AJ Pritchard.

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

(Image: PA)

The YouTube star will be performing a Contemporary dance to Celine Dion classic 'Because You Loved Me'.

Goalkeeper David James will be hoping he can save himself from another dreaded dance-off - having been involved in both of the previous ones.

The former England international is taking on a Quickstep with his pro partner Nadiya Bychkova to Greatest Showman hit 'From Now On' by Hugh Jackman.

(Image: PA)

(Image: BBC)

Elsewhere, front runner Karim Zeroual will be hoping to maintain his strong start in the competition with Welsh dancer Amy Dowden.

The favourites for the glitterball trophy will be dancing a Tango to George Ezra's 'Paradise'.

Emmerdale star Kelvin Fletcher will take on the famously difficult rumba with Oti Mabuse, while Mike Bushell is obviously dancing to Come On Eileen.

(Image: BBC)

Here is a full list of all the week 4 songs and dances:

Alex and Neil: Tango to Go Your Own Way by Fleetwood Mac

Catherine and Johannes: Charleston to Single Ladies by Beyoncé

Emma B and Anton: Viennese Waltz to Send in the Clowns by Barbra Streisand

Viscountess Emma and Aljaž: Jive to Kids in America by Kim Wilde

Michelle and Giovanni: Salsa to Quimbara by Johnny Pacheco and Celia Cruz

Saffron and AJ: Couple’s Choice: Contemporary to Because You Loved Me by Celine Dion

Chris and Karen: Jive to Saturday Night’s Alright (For Fighting) by Elton John

David and Nadiya: Quickstep to From Now On by Hugh Jackman

Dev and Dianne: Cha Cha to Dancing With a Stranger by Sam Smith featuring Normani

Karim and Amy: Tango to Paradise by George Ezra

Kelvin and Oti: Rumba to Ain’t No Sunshine by Bill Withers

Mike and Katya: Quickstep to Come on Eileen by Dexys Midnight Runners

Will and Janette: Foxtrot to Señorita by Shawn Mendes and Camila Cabello

*Strictly Come Dancing airs on Tuesday on BBC One at 6.40pm
description: The remaining couples will be back on the dance floor again this week - minus dumped Anneka Rice and Kevin Clifton
